Text:
123Pet  enables  your  pet salon or other business to manage clients,  appointments, products, services, and payroll. The program  provides  all  the  functions  needed  to run a pet salon  or  mobile  grooming  business. Appointment, product, client,  and  inventory  tracking  are  available,  as  well online  appointment  booking,  credit card processing, and a complete  line  of hardware (cash drawers, barcode scanners, printers, and complete PC systems).		

          URL: http://www.123petsoftware.com
